# addAction(handler:)

**Instance Method**

Adds an action with the specified handler to the UI update link.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func addAction(handler: @escaping (UIUpdateLink, UIUpdateInfo) -> Void)
```

## Discussion

This method adds the action to the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUpdateActionPhase/beforeCADisplayLinkDispatch] phase. To specify a different phase, use [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIUpdateLink/addAction(to:handler:)] instead.

## Adding actions

- **addAction(to:handler:)**: Adds an action with the specified handler to the UI update link for a particular UI update phase.
- **addAction(target:selector:)**: Adds an action with the specified target and selector to the UI update link.
- **addAction(to:target:selector:)**: Adds an action with the specified target and selector to the UI update link for a particular UI update phase.
- **UIUpdateActionPhase**: An object that defines specific phases of the UI update process.
